result.title: Communication, dissemination and exploitation plan
result.description: "Impact roadmap and the platform ""The State of European Film"" Updated Plan for exploitation, dissemination and communication that aligns and coordinates all WP8 activities with objectives and expected impact; includes dissemination materials, campaign messages, KPIs and timeline of activities and above all the exploitation via a constant update, of the State of European Film platform. This platform is an interactive dashboard that builds on FIDA’s data sources. Integrated with the FIDA tool (D2) the platform includes recommendations for stakeholders for increased capability for transformation and innovation in the sector."

result.title: Challenges and opportunities for trans-continental collaboration
result.description: This document will report the needs preferences barriers and opportunities for collaboration between DIHs and synthesise them into a report highlighting mutual benefits for both continents This document will be updated at the end of the project incorporating evaluation results and lessons learned during implementation culminating into a Blueprint for Transcontinental collaboration
